app.description: Split VCF Using a Burden Splitter (by gene, transcript, etc..)

galaxy:param.galaxy:option: vep. All Ensembl Variant Effect Prediction

option.name: acceptFiltered
option.description: accept variants having a FILTER column. Default is ignore variants with a FILTER column

option.name: galaxyHtmlPath
option.description: When used with galaxy, the files will be expanded in that path.

option.name: ignoreAllNM
option.description: Ignore grouping by ALL_NM : gene not empty and transcript starting with NM_

option.name: ignoreAllRefSeq
option.description: Ignore grouping by ALL_REFSEQ: gene not empty and transcript NOT starting with ENST

option.name: ignoreAllEnst
option.description: Ignore grouping by ALL_ENST: gene starting with ENST

option.name: ignoreAllTranscript
option.description: Ignore grouping by all transcript for a gene

app.documentation:
This tools reads a VCF (it should be annotated with VEP) and split data into genomic area of interest (g√©ne, transcripts...). For each area, a small VCF is produced and a Fished test is computed. The final output is a zip file containing the VCFs as well as a summary file 'fisher.bed'
$ unzip -t out.zip Archive: jeter.zip testing: burden/ENSG_1_ENSG00000007400.vcf OK testing: burden/ENSG_1_ENSG00000038912.vcf OK testing: burden/ENSG_1_ENSG00000050460.vcf OK testing: burden/ENSG_1_ENSG00000097360.vcf OK
(...) testing: burden/fisher.bed OK
